text: Shan Exequiel Vesagas, is a Filipino basketball player, internet personality and actor in the Philippines, He is popularly known played roles in boys lovers (bl series) along with Esnyr Ranollo and Brent Manalo on Facebook and TikTok. ==Career== Vesagas was hailed in the city of Dasmariñas, province of Cavite, He attended at the De La Salle University of Dasmariñas and he is also a basketball player of the campus. In 2024 is currently under the GMA Network company.https://www.gmanetwork.com/entertainment/celebritylife/news/21247/shan- vesagas-pays-tribute-to-his-parents-as-he-finally-finishes-college/photo ==Filmography== ===Television=== * 2024 – Black Rider as Ryan; GMA Network * 2025 – Mine; Facebook, TikTok, YouTube Shorts ==Related pages== * Anthony Constantino * Brent Manalo ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino people Category:Filipino models Category:Filipino basketball players Category:Filipino actors
title: Shan Vesagas
